alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Jackson; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 9:24PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Winona, southeastern Buffalo, southwestern Jackson and southern Trempealeau Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 924 PM CDT, amateur radio operators reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blair to Lewiston. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Amateur radio. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Blair around 930 PM CDT. North Bend around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Merrick State Park, Lock And Dam 5 A, Camp Decorah, Dodge, Beach Corners, Wyattville, Perrot State Park, Ridgeway and Tamarack. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 247 and 261. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
